CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 31, 1956, pg. 3, reads: "Thousands Observe 'Prayer Day' Here! - Praying for Deliverance - Like the Israelites of old who prayed for deliverance from their Egyptian taskmaster, the members of Ebenezer Baptist Church gathered on 'Prayer Day' to ask liberation for the Montgomery, Ala. bus boycotters. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Rev. James Casey and six women, including Rebecca Boyd, Eula Golden, and Ella Ruffin, standing with bowed heads, for Prayer Day honoring Montgomery Alabama bus boycotters, in Ebenezer Baptist Church
